Name: The Island
About the game: The Island is an open world, with good optimization, graphics and beautiful nature. In this game, you need to survive after a shipwreck. Create items and collect resources. Build a small shelter, a large house on the beach or in the woods. Kill dangerous animals. Get food and build a fire. Do everything to survive.
Meta Title: The Island: Aug 10, 2021, Ibis Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Island? Check out the release date (Aug 10, 2021), developer insights from Ibis Games, and a complete game summary.
